TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlReader extends System.Object

summary.span: 使用 WPF 默认 XAML 读取器和关联的 XAML 对象编写器读取 XAML 输入并创建对象图。

span.span: Reads XAML input and creates an object graph, using the WPF default XAML reader and an associated XAML object writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同步方法是静态的但异步方法不是静态的需要的实例类使用。The synchronous methods are static, but the asynchronous methods are not static and require an instance of the class to use. 输出`Load`方法是单个对象，该对象表示创建的对象树或对象图的根对象。The output of the `Load` methods is a single object, which represents the root object of a created object tree or object graph. 对象图创建的通常添加到现有的 WPF 应用程序在运行时对象树。Object graphs that are created by are typically added to the existing object tree of a WPF application at run time. 否则新的对象关系图被视为 WPF 应用程序模型而断开连接。Otherwise the new object graph is considered disconnected for purposes of the WPF application model. 也就是说，不会呈现，并且不能访问使用任何对象树的技术为应用于 WPF 应用程序的主对象树 (例如，Api ， ， )。This means that it does not render, and cannot be accessed using any of the object tree techniques as applied to the WPF application's main object tree (for example, the APIs , , ). 在对象树概念的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。For more information on object tree concepts, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md). 支持以下主要方案： supports the following primary scenarios: - **克隆对象工厂**： 如果没有其他机制，引用类型通常不能包含在 WPF 对象树中的多个位置中。**Cloning/object factory**: Without additional mechanisms, a reference type generally cannot be included in more than one position in a WPF object tree. (提供对共享的支持或重复使用在 WPF 中的其他机制的示例包括基于的对象，或如支持通常可共享的对象中的项作为引用的。)一种方法要克隆的对象已存在于对象树是序列化对象使用。(Examples of additional mechanisms that offer support for sharing or re-use in WPF include objects that are based on , or support for commonly shareable objects such as that are referenced as an item from a .) One way to clone an object that is already in the object tree is to serialize the object using . 然后，使用序列化的字符串作为输入调用，并将流或作为中介。You then use the serialized string as input for a call to , with a stream or as an intermediary. - **构造对象基于中实时信息**： 通常有其他方法来使用后期绑定或用户提供的输入来更改现有对象的状态。**Constructing objects based on just-in-time information**: There are often other ways to have late-binding or user-supplied input change the state of existing objects. 例如可以使用相同的值来设置多个属性，或使用数据绑定。For example you could use the same value to set more than one property, or use data binding. 如果有其中甚至要创建的对象类型或时，才可确定在运行时与用户交互的解决方案，然后创建此类对象通过构建为一个字符串，但输入通常是有用的技术。But if you have a scenario where even the type of object to create is only determinable at run time or with user interaction, then creating such an object by building up a string for input is often a useful technique. - **使用现有资源技术**:类型通常在中使用其他框架或技术用于跨应用程序边界传输数据或对象或类似的情况。**Using existing resource techniques**: The type is used frequently in other frameworks or technologies for transferring data or objects across application boundaries or for similar situations. 然后，可以使用技术来存储或获取最终用来创建你的应用程序的一部分的对象的 XAML 格式的数据。You can then use the techniques to store or obtain XAML-formatted data that you eventually use to create an object as part of your application. - **固定文档：** 你的应用程序可能会加载包含在 WPF 应用程序对象树和 UI 中的本地或下载的 XPS 文档。**Fixed documents:** Your application might load local or downloaded XPS documents for inclusion in a WPF application object tree and UI. > [!NOTE] > 有时，此文档介绍了对象关系图，而不是对象树。This documentation sometimes describes an object graph, as opposed to an object tree. 严格的父-子关系不始终存在运行的时 WPF 应用程序，在运行的时对象关系中，因此对象关系图是更广泛适用的术语。A strict parent-child relationship does not always exist in the run time object relationships of a run time WPF application, so an object graph is a more widely applicable terminology. 但是，因为 WPF 还包括两个不同的树概念化 Api (， ) 树来比喻仍充分地应用到 WPF 中的大多数实际情况下。However, because WPF also includes two different tree conceptualization APIs (, ) the tree metaphor still applies adequately to most real-world cases in WPF. 从 XAML 语言角度来看，对象图但通常最好考虑创建对象的方式从 XAML，由于 XAML 语言本身不一定是指定将关系的详细信息的帮助器类方法到再次树状结构。From the XAML language perspective however, the object graph is often the best way to think about how objects are created out of XAML, because the XAML language itself does not necessarily specify helper class methodologies that bring the relationships more into a tree structure again. ## 代码访问安全性、 松散 XAML 和 XamlReaderCode Access Security, Loose XAML, and XamlReader XAML 是一种直接表示对象实例化和执行的标记语言。XAML is a markup language that directly represents object instantiation and execution. 因此，在 XAML 中创建的元素能够像等效的生成代码那样与系统资源（如网络访问、文件系统 IO）进行交互。Therefore, elements created in XAML have the same ability to interact with system resources (network access, file system IO, for example) as the equivalent generated code does. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)]安全框架[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cas](~/includes/tlasharptla-cas-md.md)]。 supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)] security framework [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cas](~/includes/tlasharptla-cas-md.md)]. 这意味着在 Internet 区域中运行的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 内容具有缩减的执行权限。This means that [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content running in the internet zone has reduced execution permissions. “宽松型 XAML”（由 XAML 查看器在加载时解释的非编译 XAML 的页面）和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] 通常在此 Internet 区域中运行，并且使用相同的权限集。"Loose XAML" (pages of noncompiled XAML interpreted at load time by a XAML viewer) and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] are usually run in this internet zone and use the same permission set. 但是，加载到完全受信任的应用程序中的 XAML 与承载应用程序具有相同的系统资源访问权限。However, XAML loaded in to a fully trusted application has the same access to the system resources as the hosting application does. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)。For more information, see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md). 有关这些语句的影响是应用程序设计必须使您决定要加载 XAML 的信任决定。The implications of these statements for is that your application design must make trust decisions about the XAML you decide to load. 如果你加载不受信任的 XAML 中，请考虑实施您自己的沙盒技术来加载生成的对象图的方式。If you are loading XAML that is not trusted, consider implementing your own sandboxing technique for how you load the resulting object graph. 此外可以由部分受信任代码调用。 can also be called by partial trust code. 在这种情况下，Internet 安全区域被应用于代码访问安全性。In this case, Internet security zone is applied for code access security. 如果加载的 XAML 中的任何内容无效 Internet 安全区域下，XAML 分析异常引发。If anything in the loaded XAML is invalid under Internet security zone, a XAML parse exception is thrown. XBAP 和部分信任级别的平台的其他情况下下其中属于与显式部分信任的调用的执行，获取相同的异常行为。Under XBAP and other cases that are partial trust at the platform level, where is part of the execution, you get the same exception behavior as with explicit partial trust calls. ## WPF XAML、 XAML 读取器/编写器和 XAML 语言版本控制WPF XAML, XAML Readers/Writers, and XAML Language Versioning XAML2009 包括语言功能，如[X:reference](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-reference-markup-extension.md)并[X:factorymethod](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-factorymethod-directive.md)。XAML2009 includes language features such as [x:Reference](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-reference-markup-extension.md) and [x:FactoryMethod](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-factorymethod-directive.md). 你可以使用的签名`Load`或`Parse`加载使用这些功能的 XAML。You can use signatures of `Load` or `Parse` to load XAML that uses these features. 但是，这些语言功能不支持需要标记编译的 XAML (例如为 XAML**页**生成 WPF 应用程序或标记编译任务在生成操作中的涉及到任何 XAML 中的操作)。However, those language features are not supported for XAML that needs to be markup compiled (such as XAML for the **Page** build action in a WPF application, or any XAML that involves the markup compile task in the build actions). WPF 类型和 WPF 技术在一般情况下支持依赖于使用 WPF 内部结构的概念。WPF types and the WPF technology in general support concepts that rely on access to WPF internals. 例如，WPF 如何实现依赖关系属性依赖于有效的类型成员查找的内部方法。For instance, how WPF implements dependency properties relies on internal techniques for efficient type-member lookup. XAML 读取和写入中提供的 Api 支持访问这些内部并从命名空间和 PresentationFramework 程序集中。Access to these internals is enabled by the XAML reading and writing APIs provided in and from the namespace and PresentationFramework assembly. 但是，较低级别 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器从 System.Xaml 程序集 (类基于， ) 不能访问到 WPF 内部结构。However, the lower-level XAML readers and XAML writers from the System.Xaml assembly (classes based on , ) do not have access to the WPF internals. 对任何特定于 WPF 程序集没有依赖项从 System.Xaml。There is no dependency from System.Xaml to any WPF-specific assembly. 如果不访问 WPF 内部机制，System.Xaml 阅读器和编写器无法正确加载或保存所有 WPF 类型基于 WPF 类型。Without access to the WPF internals, System.Xaml readers and writers cannot correctly load or save all WPF types, or types based on WPF types. 具体而言，System.Xaml 阅读器和编写器不了解概念，如 WPF 依赖属性支持属性存储区或 WPF 如何使用样式、 资源字典和模板的所有的具体信息。In particular, the System.Xaml readers and writers do not understand concepts such as the WPF dependency property backing property store, or all the specifics of how WPF uses styles, resource dictionaries and templates. 因此，您可以选择进行：Therefore you have a choice to make: - 如果您正在加载 WPF 类型和/或以任何方式的 BAML 形式使用 XAML，使用 PresentationFramework XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器。If you are loading WPF types, and/or you are using XAML in BAML form in any way, use the PresentationFramework XAML readers and XAML writers. - 如果您不依赖于任何 WPF 类型也的 BAML 形式的 XAML，并为特定于该框架的原因而未使用另一种特定技术的 XAML 读取器或 XAML 编写器实现，使用 System.Xaml XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器。If you are not relying on any WPF types or the BAML form of XAML, and are not using another specific technology's XAML reader or XAML writer implementation for reasons that are specific to that framework, use the System.Xaml XAML readers and XAML writers. ## System.Xaml 支持.NET 4 中的实现System.Xaml Backing Implementation in .NET 4 是 WPF 框架级 XAML 分析器可调用的 API 图面。 is the callable API surface for the WPF framework-level XAML parser. 相同的基础 XAML 分析器还执行运行时 XAML 加载和分析的 WPF 应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。The same underlying XAML parser also performs the run-time XAML loading and parsing for WPF applications that target [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 如果你正面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，外部 API 是相同的但实现的部分基于[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]在 System.Xaml 程序集中，这将提高许多分析 XAML 的技术和报告方面的常规 XAML 实现。If you are targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the external API is the same, but parts of the implementation are built on the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] general XAML implementation in the System.Xaml assembly, which improves many of the technical and reporting aspects of parsing XAML. 面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]一定需要包括 System.Xaml 作为一个引用和实现的详细信息，如报告异常可能来自 System.Xaml 定义的类型。Targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] necessarily entails including System.Xaml as a reference, and details of implementation such as the exceptions reported may come from System.Xaml defined types. ## Examples 以下示例将转换为字符串，并使用类。The following example converts a into a string using the class. 字符串随后被加载回使用静态方法类。The string is then loaded back into a using the static method on the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步的 XAML 加载操作最初将返回一个对象，是纯粹的根对象。An asynchronous XAML load operation will initially return an object that is purely the root object. 以异步方式，然后分析 XAML 将继续，并在根目录下填充任何子对象。Asynchronously, XAML parsing then continues, and any child objects are filled in under the root. 这与典型的 WPF XAML 处理行为和及其与 WPF 对象生存期概念的交互。This is in contrast to the typical WPF XAML processing behavior and its interaction with WPF concepts of object lifetime. 中的典型 （非异步） 交互，返回一个元素并将其加载汇报之前都是包括所有子集合的对象的所有属性。In the typical (non-async) interaction, all properties of an object including all child collections are filled before returning an element and reporting it as loaded. 该行为等同于自下而上的方法，用于创建的树的根对象所在的最后一个对象变为可用。That behavior equates to a bottom-up methodology for creating the tree where the root object is the last object to become available. 通常会将返回的对象分配到 WPF 应用程序的对象树中的某个位置、 与内容的知识可能仍会填入和作为 UI 的一部分公开的全部内容可能会导致增量布局更新。You typically would assign the returned object to some location in your WPF application's object tree, with the knowledge that content might still be filling in and might cause incremental layout updates if the entire content is exposed as part of the UI. 出于此原因，它是典型隔离或虚拟化任何以异步方式加载的对象从 XAML，并使用特定于应用程序逻辑或应用程序状态时进行通知进行处理。For this reason it is typical to isolate or virtualize any asynchronously loaded objects from XAML, and to use application-specific logic or application state to notify when is handled. 为了使若要加载以异步方式输入 XAML，XAML 输入中的根元素必须包含的属性和值`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`。In order for to load XAML input asynchronously, the root element in the XAML input must contain the attribute and value `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`. 值被视为区分大小写。The value is treated as case sensitive. 如果 XAML 输入的根不包含`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`，不会引发异常，并调用被处理为同步加载 (请参阅)。If the XAML input root does not contain `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`, no exception is thrown, and the call is processed as a synchronous load (see ). 每个实例只有一个异步加载操作类可以执行一次。Only one asynchronous load operation per instance of the class can be performed at a time. 如果将多个异步操作尝试在同一个实例上类引发。If more than one asynchronous operation is attempted on the same instance of the class an is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 对同一个 的多个加载操作用时挂起。

span.span: Multiple load operations are pending concurrently with the same .

The root of the created object tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步的 XAML 加载操作最初将返回一个对象，是纯粹的根对象。An asynchronous XAML load operation will initially return an object that is purely the root object. 以异步方式，然后分析 XAML 将继续，并在根目录下填充任何子对象。Asynchronously, XAML parsing then continues, and any child objects are filled in under the root. 这与典型的 WPF XAML 处理行为和及其与 WPF 对象生存期概念的交互。This is in contrast to the typical WPF XAML processing behavior and its interaction with WPF concepts of object lifetime. 中的典型 （非异步） 交互，返回一个元素并将其加载汇报之前都是包括所有子集合的对象的所有属性。In the typical (non-async) interaction, all properties of an object including all child collections are filled before returning an element and reporting it as loaded. 该行为等同于自下而上的方法，用于创建的树的根对象所在的最后一个对象变为可用。That behavior equates to a bottom-up methodology for creating the tree where the root object is the last object to become available. 通常会分配从返回的对象到应用程序的对象树中的某个位置，熟悉内容可能仍会填入和作为的一部分公开的全部内容可能会导致增量布局更新用户界面。You typically would assign the returned object from to some location in your application's object tree, with the knowledge that content might still be filling in and might cause incremental layout updates if the entire content is exposed as part of the UI. 出于此原因，它是典型隔离或虚拟化任何以异步方式加载的对象从 XAML，并使用特定于应用程序逻辑或应用程序状态时进行通知进行处理。For this reason it is typical to isolate or virtualize any asynchronously loaded objects from XAML, and to use application-specific logic or application state to notify when is handled. 为了使若要加载以异步方式输入 XAML，XAML 标记中的根元素必须包含的属性和值`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`。In order for to load XAML input asynchronously, the root element in the XAML markup must contain the attribute and value `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`. 值被视为区分大小写。The value is treated as case sensitive. 如果 XAML 标记根不包含`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`，不会引发异常，且调用改为处理为同步加载 (请参阅)。If the XAML markup root does not contain `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`, no exception is thrown, and the call is instead processed as a synchronous load (see ). 每个实例只有一个异步加载操作类可以执行一次。Only one asynchronous load operation per instance of the class can be performed at a time. 如果将多个异步操作尝试在同一个实例上类引发。If more than one asynchronous operation is attempted on the same instance of the class an is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 对同一个 同时执行多个加载操作。

span.span: Multiple load operations are performed concurrently with the same .

MemberSignature.Value: public object LoadAsync (System.IO.Stream stream, System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext parserContext);
.method public hidebysig instance object LoadAsync(class System.IO.Stream stream, class System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext parserContext) cil managed
public: System::Object ^ LoadAsync(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::Windows::Markup::ParserContext ^ parserContext);

param.name: stream
param.span: 包含要加载的 XAML 输入的流。

span.span: A stream containing the XAML input to load.

param.name: parserContext
param.span: 由分析器使用的上下文信息。

span.span: Context information used by the parser.

summary.span: 读取指定 中的 XAML 输入，并返回相应对象树的根。

span.span: Reads the XAML input in the specified and returns the root of the corresponding object tree.
The root of the created object tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步的 XAML 加载操作最初将返回一个对象，是纯粹的根对象。An asynchronous XAML load operation will initially return an object that is purely the root object. 以异步方式，然后分析 XAML 将继续，并在根目录下填充任何子对象。Asynchronously, XAML parsing then continues, and any child objects are filled in under the root. 这与典型的 WPF XAML 处理行为和及其与 WPF 对象生存期概念的交互。This is in contrast to the typical WPF XAML processing behavior and its interaction with WPF concepts of object lifetime. 中的典型 （非异步） 交互，返回一个元素并将其加载汇报之前都是包括所有子集合的对象的所有属性。In the typical (non-async) interaction, all properties of an object including all child collections are filled before returning an element and reporting it as loaded. 该行为等同于自下而上的方法，用于创建的树的根对象所在的最后一个对象变为可用。That behavior equates to a bottom-up methodology for creating the tree where the root object is the last object to become available. 通常会将返回的对象分配到应用程序的对象树中的某个位置、 与内容的知识可能仍会填入和作为 UI 的一部分公开的全部内容可能会导致增量布局更新。You typically would assign the returned object to some location in your application's object tree, with the knowledge that content might still be filling in and might cause incremental layout updates if the entire content is exposed as part of the UI. 出于此原因，它是典型隔离或虚拟化任何以异步方式加载的对象从 XAML，并使用特定于应用程序逻辑或应用程序状态时进行通知进行处理。For this reason it is typical to isolate or virtualize any asynchronously loaded objects from XAML, and to use application-specific logic or application state to notify when is handled. 为了使若要以异步方式加载标记，在 XAML 标记中的根元素必须包含的属性和值`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`。In order for to load markup asynchronously, the root element in the XAML markup must contain the attribute and value `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`. 值被视为区分大小写。The value is treated as case sensitive. 如果 XAML 标记根不包含`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`，不会引发异常，并调用被处理为同步加载 (请参阅)。If the XAML markup root does not contain `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`, no exception is thrown, and the call is processed as a synchronous load (see ). 每个实例只有一个异步加载操作类可以执行一次。Only one asynchronous load operation per instance of the class can be performed at a time. 如果将多个异步操作尝试在同一个实例上类引发。If more than one asynchronous operation is attempted on the same instance of the class an is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 对同一个 同时执行多个加载操作。

summary.span: 在异步加载操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous load operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外异步加载操作中止时引发。 is also raised when an asynchronous load operation aborts.

summary.span: 读取指定文本字符串中的标记，并返回与指定标记的根对应的对象。

span.span: Reads the markup in the specified text string and returns an object that corresponds to the root of the specified markup.

summary.span: 读取指定文本字符串中的 XAML 输入，并返回与指定标记的根对应的对象。

span.span: Reads the XAML input in the specified text string and returns an object that corresponds to the root of the specified markup.
The root of the created object tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现调用从字符串创建流后在内部。The implementation calls internally after creating a stream from the string. 请参阅的其他信息，例如可能的异常。See for additional information such as possible exceptions.
